name: Evil at Baldur's Gate
summary: Evil at Baldur's Gate is a series of Dungeons & Dragons comic books published by IDW Publishing It is a continuation of the series Legends of Baldur's Gate.
info:
• 中文名: 邪恶在博德之门
  • 册数: 1
  • 出版社: IDW Publishing
  • 发售日: 2018-04
  • 结束: 2018-08
  • 作者: Jim Zub
  • 作画: Dean Kotz, Neil Uyetake, Stefani Rennee
